sentences.en: Bob and his family are on vacation; they've gone to Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃和他全家在度假, 他们去夏威夷了.

sentences.en: Did you have a lot of reading during the vacation?
sentences.cn: 放假期间你读了很多书吗？

sentences.en: Do you have any idea for this vacation?
sentences.cn: 这个假期你有什么想法吗？

sentences.en: Do you have any vacation plans?
sentences.cn: 您假期有什么安排吗？

sentences.en: He is quite run down and needs a vacation.
sentences.cn: 他的身体太虚弱,需要休假.

sentences.en: He kept in touch with us while he was on vacation.
sentences.cn: 他在度假期间仍与我们保持联系.

sentences.en: He looked tanned and well rested after his vacation.
sentences.cn: 度假之后，他皮肤晒得黝黑，精神焕发。

sentences.en: I can't afford the vacation, for it would eat up my savings.
sentences.cn: 我度不起假, 那样会把我的积蓄用光的.

sentences.en: Neff hitchhiked to New York during his Christmas vacation.
sentences.cn: 内夫在圣诞节假期里搭顺风车去了纽约。

sentences.en: Schools give a vacation from July 12 to September 1.
sentences.cn: 学校自7月12日到9月1日放假.

sentences.en: Soon school will end and the vacation will be at hand.
sentences.cn: 学期快结束了,假期即将到来.

sentences.en: The classes of our university closed for the summer vacation.
sentences.cn: 我们大学停课放暑假.

sentences.en: The French get five to six weeks' vacation a year.
sentences.cn: 法国人每年有5到6周的假期。

sentences.en: They planned a late summer vacation in Europe.
sentences.cn: 他们打算夏末去欧洲度假。

sentences.en: To find out, make Christchurch your next vacation destination.
sentences.cn: 找找看, 明年的暑假新西兰基督城是你旅游的目标.

sentences.en: We’re planning a vacation in Europe.
sentences.cn: 我们正计划去欧洲度假。

sentences.en: We’re planning to go on vacation soon.
sentences.cn: 我们在计划近期去度假。

sentences.en: What will you do this vacation?
sentences.cn: 你这个假期将干什么？

sentences.en: Who cares about some stupid vacation?
sentences.cn: 谁在乎什么愚蠢的度假？

sentences.en: You've missed your vacation, Mary, you should have been a nurse!
sentences.cn: 你找错了行当, 玛丽, 你该当护士.
